Peoria.Cortez Lake:
Cortez Lake is located in Cortez Park in northwest Phoenix, at the northeast corner of 35th Avenue and Dunlap Avenue.


== Fish species ==
Rainbow trout
Largemouth bass
Sunfish
Catfish (channel)
Carp
